Template.Name: Template_Space_Squadron
Template.Description: Sadly, variant inheritance is broken for squadrons when it comes to Squadron_Offsets. New offsets cannot be added to the child and will not overwrite the ones from the template. As soon as it is used in the child, squadron offets no longer work and units are stuck (exactly) inside each other. This does happen even when there are no Squadron_Offsets in the template at all.
